name: Galaxy™ 622
description: Galaxy™ 622 is a versatile cosmetic ingredient designed to enhance various personal care applications. With Sodium Laureth Sulfate as its INCI name, this product offers pumpability and cold-processability. It combines the benefits of Cocamide MEA, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, and Sodium Chloride, serving as a viscosity builder that boosts viscosity. Available in pails, Galaxy™ 622 is an ideal choice for formulating products in the beauty and skin care sector.
